da5257c0-25e2-490d-bb16-ffc4089776b7.description: Professionals who earn this certificate develop an analytical mindset and use core concepts that underpin the application of data analytics to frame problems and define project scopes. Certificate earners work with stakeholders to understand organizational capabilities and gaps. These professionals conduct and apply data analytics to outcome driven projects and help realize the untapped potential of data, make better decisions, and add value in day-to-day business operations.

Badge earners advise their organizations in RPA to transform the business into a significant competitor and a strategic business partner. These professionals consider key steps needed to build an effective RPA strategy including the critical role human intelligence plays to ensure a successful strategy.
cc75b1c3-fd57-405a-b9cb-48d8c5b9167e.name: Robotic Process Automation Strategy for Business Leaders

Earners recognize U.S. GAAP reporting standards applicable to not-for-profits and identify basic state and federal filing requirements of exempt organizations. These professionals also identify best practices in nonprofit board governance and the planning steps of a nonprofit audit engagement.

Они имеют навыки планирования бюджета, могут принимать информированные решения о ценообразовании, эффективно управлять издержками и эффективностью производства товаров и услуг, в том числе цифровых.

c9f3448f-1695-4586-994d-098c4d19fdd0.description: Earners of the IFRS Certificate can compete effectively in today's global business environment through a mastery of International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) as set by the International Accounting Standards Board (IASB). Badge earners develop knowledge and skills to assist their companies in international financial accounting and reporting. These candidates assess standard-setting proposals from both FASB and IASB to know what will affect their organization's financial reporting.

To maintain an active badge, participants are required complete additional learning every 2 years (from date of issue) to demonstrate knowledge of new IFRS standards issued by the International Accounting Standards Board (IASB).

b6284c9c-1a60-4915-89c2-48401cfb10e8.description: CIMA members who earn the Digital Mindset badge have developed the capabilities and confidence needed to not just survive but thrive in the digital future. 5b7df2fd-8299-4290-88c4-74bb38e2aaaf.description: Earners of the Elijah Watt Sells Award badge, named in honor of one of the country’s first CPAs, are part of annual recognition the AICPA bestows upon candidates with outstanding performance on the Uniform CPA Examination®. Badge earners are eligible to receive the award in the calendar year following the year in which they completed testing. On all four sections of the Uniform CPA Examination®, these candidates obtained a cumulative average score above 95.50 and passed on their first attempt.
5b7df2fd-8299-4290-88c4-74bb38e2aaaf.name: Elijah Watt Sells Award Recipient

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of the U.S. International Tax: Advanced Issues badge have demonstrated knowledge of complex international transactions, including the major areas of US international tax reform such as reorganizations, stock acquisitions, inversion rules under Section 7874, related party stock sales, section 367 gain, gain recognition agreement, E&P inclusion, non-recognition treatment, section 351, section 332, transfer pricing, and global BEPS.

Completion of this five-course series builds on the foundation established from the second series by exploring and expanding into more complex topics. This series of courses include: • U.S. Transfer Pricing and Global BEPS • U.S. Tax Treaties • International Tax Transactions I • International Tax Transactions II • Corporate formations, reorganization, acquisitions, and liquidations
U.S. International Tax: Core Concepts
U.S. International Tax: Inbound and Outbound Transactions

36f47059-3a41-4581-be0c-09926d7e9c85.description: The AICPA and CPA Practice Advisor honor 25 leaders in the profession annually with the Most Powerful Women in Accounting Award. Nominations are open to the public and independent judges select those who best embody the following: Being a driving force for innovation and excellence. Contributing to the success of their organization and the profession as a whole. Providing guidance and leadership for the growth of the profession. Representing the profession through civic and community outreach.
36f47059-3a41-4581-be0c-09926d7e9c85.name: AICPA & CPA Practice Advisor’s Most Powerful Women in Accounting Award Recipient

issuer.summary: issued by Association of International Certified Professional Accountants

entity.name: Association of International Certified Professional Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Nominated by a peer and selected by a group of independent judges

The AICPA cosponsors this award to celebrate and support the success of women leaders, part of its broader mission of growing a diverse and inclusive profession. The AICPA’s Women’s Initiatives Executive Committee (WIEC) sponsors research, mentorships, networking opportunities, the Women to Watch awards and oversees the annual AICPA Women’s Global Leadership Summit.
Learn more at aicpa.org/womenlead

1f23271d-513a-43ca-a865-2698e3abb457.description: The accounting and finance profession is seeing seismic change because of new technologies developing and launching ahead of the profession's ability, and willingness, to adapt and take advantage of sizable benefits. Digital mindsets are reported to be one of the key barriers in the initial adoption of technology, its full use, and exploiting the opportunity it presents. Many early adopters are still experimenting but most of the market are in the late-majority category of adopters.

In addition, gain invaluable knowledge to propel you toward becoming an overall business adviser for your small- to mid-tier business clients, as you provide assistance beyond tax and accounting related matters.

Using their audit background and knowledge of the SOC suite of services, these professionals apply the AICPA SOC for Supply Chain guidance when appropriate.

67691b4c-6cae-4829-9af4-dd4909e3ec3d.description: This dynamic series is designed to provide you with a practical understanding of AI today, what powers AI and a roadmap to begin your Artificial Intelligence (AI) journey. AI is considered the fastest moving technology in history, so stay ahead of the curve and prepare for the revolution by exploring the possibilities of what AI can do for your business or firm and how it can and will increase your competitive edge.
67691b4c-6cae-4829-9af4-dd4909e3ec3d.name: HP Finance Artificial Intelligence

ba2a16ba-a6e1-4deb-80cc-432ff1dc531e.description: Develop your knowledge on blockchain finance. Enhance your competitive edge, explore global supply chain interactions, and understand how blockchain is used to reduce errors and increase transparency and auditability. Understand the future trends of blockchain, such as decentralized apps, decentralized autonomous organizations, and offchain transactions. This course covers the many benefits, values and opportunities that arise with the emergence of blockchain technology.
